participant_1.background:
I love the smell of beans, but my stomach doesn't.
I love to read books because it transports me to another world and I can forget about my troubles.

my brother thinks he is a viking.

content.text: Doing well, thank you! How about yourself?
Doing great, thanks! I'm excited about a new book I'm reading.
It's a historical fiction novel set in the American Civil War.
Oh cool! I'm a history buff, so I'm sure I'd enjoy it.
It's really good so far! I'm about halfway through it.
I'm glad to hear that. I'm always looking for new books to read.
I love to read. It's one of my favorite hobbies.
Me too! I read a lot of nonfiction and self-help books.
I like those too, but I also love a good fiction novel.
I agree! Fiction can be so much more immersive than nonfiction.
It's true. I can get lost in a good book for hours.
Me too! I can't wait to hear what you think of the book you're reading.
I'll be sure to let you know
